data.title: Pattison Agriculture
data.meta_description:
Pattison Agriculture | 3,216 followers on LinkedIn. Through teamwork and innovation, we partner with our customers who help feed the world. | With over 50 years of experience in the agricultural industry, and over 500 employees working at 18 locations across Saskatchewan and Manitoba, we at Pattison Agriculture are committed to providing the complete equipment solutions experience for every individual customer. 

We strive to provide industry-leading technology, agronomic services, and support to ensure our customers are leading the way into the future of the industry. This award-winning customer service starts with a team of factory-trained staff that have gained respect for their demonstrated knowledge and expertise.
data.text:
With over 50 years of experience in the agricultural industry, and over 500 employees working at 18 locations across Saskatchewan and Manitoba, we at Pattison Agriculture are committed to providing the complete equipment solutions experience for every individual customer. We strive to provide industry-leading technology, agronomic services, and support to ensure our customers are leading the way into the future of the industry. This award-winning customer service starts with a team of factory-trained staff that have gained respect for their demonstrated knowledge and expertise. From traditional products like combines, tractors, seeders, and sprayers, to the latest technological advances that support the increased productivity of farmers, we are dedicated to the continual growth and support of our customers and the communities in which they live.

Website

https://linktr.ee/pattisonagriculture

External link for Pattison Agriculture

Industry

Agriculture, Construction, Mining Machinery Manufacturing

Company size

Type

Specialties

Agriculture Sales, Equipment Sales, Equipment Service, Sales, Service, Bobcat, Parts & Service, John Deere Agriculture, John Deere Residential, John Deere Ground Care, Harvest Equipment, Seeding Equipment, and Spraying Equipment
